lead_paragraph: A “Notes” entry in some editions on Monday with an article about the scoreless soccer draw between the United States and Argentina referred incorrectly to an accomplishment by Landon Donovan, who played in his 100th international match. He became the 11th American man to reach that milestone, not the 11th American. (The feat has also been accomplished by 19 American women, according to U.S. Soccer.).
